title: Sure Success in Ophthalmology - Viva Voce & Practical Examin
description:
We are excited to bring you the First Edition of the Ã¢â‚¬ËœSure Success in
Ophthalmology Viva Voce & Practical ExaminationÃ¢â‚¬â„¢. We realized
the need for this book while conducting Final MBBS Part 1
Examination. The book is primarily meant to help the
undergraduate students to face the oral and practical examination
of ophthalmology. The book will be helpful also for postgraduates
and PG entrance examinee. Optometry students will be benefitted
if they go through a few chapters of the book.
Each chapter is devoted to a system of the eye in brief in question
answer form, relevant long and short cases and surgery related to
the chapter. We have included a list of instruments and relevant
viva questions. A few questions have been intentionally repeated to
emphasize their importance.
A miscellaneous chapter has been included which consists of
some important tables and charts for quick revision.
The book is amply illustrated by photographs, line diagrams,
and flow charts.
Inspite of our best efforts, the book may have some inaccuracies;
feedback from teachers, students will be most welcome to improve
the book.
We hope you will enjoy reading the book before going to face
the examiner.
Jyotirmoy Datta
Chandana Chakraborti
